mapper.sql: REF_TRAN_NO, ACC_TRAN_NO, ORI_APP_TRAN_NO, ORI_MER_BILL_NO, ORI_TRAN_AMT, ORI_BILL_DATE, ORI_SUPPLIER_BILL_NO, ORI_REFRENCE_NO, ORI_AUTH_NO, REFUND_AMT, CHANNEL_CODE, CARD_NO, CARD_NO_EX, CARDHOLDER, APP_REFUND_DATE, BILL_REMARK, REFUND_ARG, REF_TYPE, STATUS, SUBMIT_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, BIZ_TYPE
mapper.insert:
select to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||SEQ_TRN_TRANREFUND.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into TCOR_TRN_TRANREFUND (REF_TRAN_NO, ACC_TRAN_NO, ORI_APP_TRAN_NO, ORI_MER_BILL_NO, ORI_TRAN_AMT, ORI_BILL_DATE, ORI_SUPPLIER_BILL_NO, ORI_REFRENCE_NO, ORI_AUTH_NO, REFUND_AMT, CHANNEL_CODE, CARD_NO, CARD_NO_EX, CARDHOLDER, APP_REFUND_DATE, BILL_REMARK, REFUND_ARG, REF_TYPE, STATUS, SUBMIT_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, BIZ_TYPE ) values (#{refTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriAppTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriMerBillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriTranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oriBillDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oriSupplierBillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriRefrenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriAuthNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNoEx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardholder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appRefundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{billRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundArg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizType,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.update:
update TCOR_TRN_TRANREFUND
ACC_TRAN_NO = #{accTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORI_APP_TRAN_NO = #{oriAppTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ORI_REFRENCE_NO = #{oriRefrenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORI_AUTH_NO = #{oriAuthNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where REF_TRAN_NO = #{refTranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
